needs: Bukky seeks to lead EPC projects with clear, measurable outcomes by defining constraints, signals, and iterating designs based on data. They aim to improve project efficiency, reduce costs, and mitigate risks while managing budgets around $1.4M. Their part-time schedule and focus on pragmatic architecture and continuous alignment shape their current priorities.
personality: Bukky communicates analytically and with systems orientation, valuing transparency through decision logs and concise documentation. They emphasize simplicity, accountability, and early surfacing of unknowns via probes. Their collaboration is inclusive and evidence-based, favoring experiments over debates and maintaining momentum through clear metrics and iterative processes.
